result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Pre-trial conference on December 16, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing. Defendant to have no contact with Goodwill listed in the Criminal Complaint.

1:14 PM . Defendant Kenneth W Zdroik in court, in custody.  Attorney Amanda Marie Nimmer in court for Kenneth W Zdroik. District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin by Julian Marrufo.   
Defense acknowledges receipt of complaint and waives reading of complaint. Service admitted/advised of charges and potential penalties. Defendant is eligible for State Public Defender representation.  An attorney will be appointed. NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for December 16, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant returned copy of summons filed by District Attorney office

11:28 AM District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin by Abigail Kincheloe. Defendant Kenneth W Zdroik not in court. 

State motions the Court to issue a warrant for the defendant.
The Court notes that the Defendant is in custody at the Ozaukee  County Jail. 
Due to the many cases in different counties, the Court will issue a $1,000.00 arrest warrant.
EXT CODE 3.
Initial appearance on August 18, 2022 at 10:00 am.

10:59 AM Defendant Kenneth W Zdroik not in court.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant might be in custody in Milwauke County.    Court ordered a warrant stayed until next court date.  Initial appearance scheduled for August 18, 2022 at 10:00 am.
